lines.text: If this is justice, then I'm a banana!
The regular Japanese police force are a bunch of pussies, but these special security agents are different!
Forget about me, you get after 'em.
God she's a hard-cased lil' bitch!
Peace, just get off my fucking case would ya? I'm sick of takin' this shit from you!
Start acting like a human being and I'll cut you some slack. Anyway, see you tomorrow, ice bitch!
Ah to fuck with her anyway.
It doesn't matter what crap you inject me with. I can resist anything you throw at me!
Alright, buttfuck, that's enough speech-making for now.
You crazy self-righteous fucking lunatic! You know you're talking shit!

But you wouldn't drop the case would you? Oh no, not you, not the great Taki? Who the fuck do you think you are? Some kind of latter day Lone Ranger, huh? Well now you're gonna be the DEAD fuckin' ranger!
You've underestimated the power of Japanese technology, you evil bitch!
